====Usage notes====
* While {{lang|zh|還是}}／{{lang|zh|还是}} (when meaning "or") is exclusively used in questions and in phrases with words like {{zh-l|不管}} or {{zh-l|無論}}, its synonym {{zh-l|或者}} (or {{zh-l|或}}) is only used in statements.
